title: Use Transpose to Convert Field Names to Upper Case
source_file: Queries-Only/Helpful-CQL-Queries/Use Transpose to Convert Field Names to Upper Case.md
use_case: Utility query for Use Transpose to Convert Field Names to Upper Case
query:
| createEvents(["color=blue", "shape=round", "size=large"])
| kvParse()
| transpose(limit=1000)
| column := upper(column)
| transpose(header=column,limit=1000)
| drop(column)
